features: Economical and durable mop: This microfiber dust mop with two pieces reusable refill mop pads, the chenille microfiber mop pad can quickly absorb lots of water,and the full polyester microfiber replacement pad with better cleaning power, it can remove stains in cracks on the ground such as tiles,perfect for damp mopping and dry sweeping.
Gentle surface of the Dust Mop: This mop suitable for all kinds of wooden floors, tile floors, laminate floors and so on. It can be used for Wet or Dry Floor Cleaning.
Extendable Long Handle: You can adjust the length from 44.5" to 55.5". And this light weight mop friendly for ladies and the elderly.

Easy installation and washable microfiber mop pads: Buckle design, the mop pad can be removed and washed by machine. A good choice for kitchen floors, restaurant, bathroom, garages, warehouses, office and so on.
Flexible rotating 360 spin mop head:Make the mop easily clean the floor under the sofa, under the bed, and other corners. The mop can be used not only as a floor mop, but also as a wall mop.
CLEANHOME has an independent factory dedicated to the production of cleaning products for 35 years. If you encounter any problem while using the product, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dust mopping made easy
reviews.reviewText: The dust pads work well for the dog hairs and dust I contend with. The dust mop is very flexible; it goes under my couch and bed easily and the rotates a bit and I’m off to dust mopping open floor. I am very happy with this dust mop because it works well and is easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for hardwood floord
reviews.reviewText: We recently removed all the carpet in our home in total for rooms. We also have a medium sized long-haired pet hence dog hair. This was easy to put together very sturdy. The mop head itself is great quality and can be washed. May be going back for a second one soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Picks up dust and pet hair!
reviews.reviewText: After sweeping my hard flooring there always seemed to be dog hair left behind. This dust mop is a game changer! It does an excellent job of picking up dust and pet hair and is very easy to maneuver around the house. My only annoyance is the handle does not stay extended and needs to be adjusted quite frequently. I did see this was an issue in some of the reviews but I wanted to see for myself. I do love the quality of the dust mop but this is one thing that could be improved upon. I’m pretty handy so I think I can figure out a fix. Go ahead and buy it; it’s great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pick up on busy floor
reviews.reviewText: I use this at school in the kitchen after each class to gather crumbs, flour etc. avoid water

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My household recently moved to a house with luxury vinyl flooring.My household also includes two dogs, one of which with a long double coat that sheds all the time.I was looking for a cheap and easy dust mop with easy-to-maintain changeable heads, because trying to use a regular broom to sweep was taking forever and seemed to be kicking up more hair than it was cleaning. This more than fits the bill.It came in a small box with pieces of the handle that screw together, and took all of about a minute to assemble. The handle feels surprisingly strong and durable, much better than any of the regular brooms we have. What would have been ten or fifteen minutes of sweeping was accomplished in literally two minutes, and the floors looked better than they have since we moved in. The only thing that could be improved upon is a swivel option, as the head is locked into position and isn't always easy to maneuver at weird angles or if it's held too far from the body, but that's a minor complaint and not a deal killer.To clean the head, I use held it up over a trashcan and brushed it off with my fingers to clear most of the dog hair and dirt. There were a few things that the dustmop didn't pick up, like gravel, that I had to get with the regular mop but that's generally how dust mops work.I haven't had to wash the mopheads yet but both feel like they're decent quality. Other reviews have mentioned the mopheads fraying in the wash; I'll update my review if anything changes. Until then, I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay, but could be better
reviews.reviewText: This is a great dust mop. I just wish the pod wouldn’t slide around so much would be nice if it had more of an area to hold onto to keep it in place better. Otherwise it is aI just wish the pad wouldn’t slide around so much would be nice if it had more of an area to hold onto to keep it in place better. Otherwise it is a decent mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works way better than a broom!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this product for my stained concrete floors. After sweeping with a broom. My floors always looked dirty. This broom picks up dust, sand(we have a lot), pet hair (three dogs) and anything else that poses a problem cleaning your floors. Easy and quick to use. So happy I made this purchase. My floors finally look clean after using this broom.
Me gustó más uno marca Scotch brite que compré hace un tiempo con ustedes, pero ya no lo venden

Easy to assemble and easy to swap out the dust pad for the microfiber pad. Washing the pads is a breeze. If I have a spot on the kitchen floor, I spray a bit of water on the floor with a spray bottle, and use the microfiber pad and it takes it right up. The dust mop pad works well on all floor types, and is much easier than a broom to use on stairs.
Facile à nettoyer à la laveuse.Je suis satisfaite!
Love it! Use it all the time; it’s so easy to use and gets the job done quickly.Good purchase.
